summary: I HIT A TRUCK, DESTROYED MY RIGHT FRONT HEADLIGHT, MY AIRBAGS DID NOT DEPLOY......... MY NIECE HAS THE SAME CAR, SHE WAS HIT, THEY TOTALED OUT HER CAR. AND HER. AIR BAGS ALSO DID NOT DEPLOY. SHE COULD HAVE BEEN KILLED. WHAT'S GOING ON I AM FURIOUS ABOUT THIS. I AM TALKING TO AN ATTORNEY.  *TR
